name: com.lazysquirrellabs.minmaxrangeattribute
description: A bounded (i.e., with a minimum and maximum) range attribute for Unity's Vector2 and Vector2Int fields.

samples.description: This sample contains 1 scene with 1 game object which contains a script that uses the Min/Max range attribute with both Vector2Int and Vector2. Click on that game object and look at its inspector to see the attribute in action.
